item.title: Zillow盈利预期因房地产市场降温及法律成本而落空
item.description: Zillow集团公司预测第一季度利润将低于分析师预期，因这家房产搜索网站需同时承担持续诉讼产生的法律费用及与Redfin合作产生的支出。【原文：Zillow Group Inc. forecast first-quarter profit that falls short of analyst estimates as the home-search site balances legal costs from ongoing litigation and expenses from the company’s partnership with Redfin.】

item.title: Lyft盈利预期未达标，意外录得运营亏损
item.description: Lyft公司第四季度意外录得1.85亿美元的运营亏损，并发布了令人失望的年初盈利预测，这表明其全球扩张和新产品推出可能在短期内拖累利润。【原文：Lyft Inc. posted a surprise $185 million operating loss in the fourth quarter and issued a disappointing earnings forecast for the start of the year, a sign that its global expansion and new product offerings may weigh on profits in the short term.】

item.title: 日本高市早苗巩固权力——但她能兑现承诺吗？
item.description:
高市早苗的选举豪赌终获回报。如今，执政的现实考验才刚刚开始。今日《亚洲焦点》将深入剖析首相对日本的愿景，以及其雄心勃勃的施政纲领将面临的重重挑战。

【原文：

Sanae Takaichi’s election gamble paid off. Now, the reality of governing begins. On today’s Big Take Asia: Unpacking the prime minister’s vision for Japan and hurdles ahead for her ambitious agenda.

】

item.title: 联邦银行利润超预期，商业贷款业务表现亮眼
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行上半年利润超出预期，得益于其旗舰抵押贷款业务的增长以及对企业贷款的积极推动。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia’s first-half profit topped estimates, buoyed by growth in its flagship mortgage business and a push in lending more to companies.】

item.title: 债券交易商推高私募信贷基金交易成本，软件价格持续下滑
item.description: 华尔街交易商正要求提高交易私募信贷基金所发企业债券的佣金，因投资者对这些基金投资于面临人工智能颠覆的软件公司感到不安。【原文：Wall Street dealers are demanding higher compensation to trade corporate bonds issued by private credit funds, as investors turn squeamish about the funds’ exposure to software firms facing artificial intelligence disruption.】

item.title: 纽约私立学校初创企业通过提供42%学费折扣寻求竞争优势
item.description: 在纽约哈罗国际学校于九月开学前，校长马修·西普尔曾希望首学年能招收80名学生。然而目前仅有20名学生入学，而26名教职员工的人数反而超过了学生数量。【原文：Before Harrow International School New York opened its doors in September, principal Matthew Sipple hoped to enroll 80 students by the end of its inaugural year. So far, there are just 20. The kids are outnumbered by a staff of 26.】

item.title: 黑石加入Anthropic融资轮，持股规模增至10亿美元
item.description: 知情人士透露，黑石集团正加大对人工智能公司Anthropic PBC的投资力度，按该初创企业当前估值，其持股价值已升至约10亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is increasing its investment in artificial intelligence firm Anthropic PBC, elevating its stake to roughly $1 billion at the startup’s current valuation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 道明证券称，美国国债拍卖强劲的外需缓解了市场担忧
item.description: 据道明证券利率策略师称，近几个月来，外国投资者在国债拍卖中的份额持续攀升，这缓解了市场对避险资产地位受损及巨额赤字将导致外国投资者撤离的担忧。【原文：Foreign buyers of Treasury debt have been scooping up a growing share of note and bond auctions in recent months, allaying fears that tarnished haven status and large deficits would drive them away, according to interest-rate strategists at TD Securities.】

item.title: QVC正与债权人商谈破产重组债务事宜
item.description: QVC集团正与债权人协商一项自愿债务重组协议，该协议可能作为第11章破产程序的一部分实施。这家电视购物网络正面临观众流失和沉重债务负担的双重困境。【原文：QVC Group Inc. is negotiating a voluntary debt restructuring agreement with its creditors that could be implemented as part of a Chapter 11 bankruptcy process, as the television shopping network grapples with viewer declines and a heavy debt burden.】

item.title: 阿根廷通胀率1月份连续第五个月加速上升
item.description: 阿根廷通胀率在1月份连续第五个月加速上升，哈维尔·米莱正面临国家统计局局长辞职引发的连锁反应——该局长因与总统意见相左而离职。【原文：Inflation in Argentina sped up for the fifth straight month in January as Javier Milei confronts the fallout from the resignation of the head of national statistics agency because of a disagreement with the president.】

item.title: Stellantis寻求退出与三星的电池合资企业，因电动汽车亏损持续扩大
item.description: Stellantis NV正寻求退出与韩国三星SDI公司的美国电池合资企业。此前这家汽车制造商宣布了超过220亿欧元（260亿美元）的减记，正逐步撤出电动汽车领域的投资并努力保留现金。【原文：Stellantis NV is looking to exit its US battery joint venture with South Korea’s Samsung SDI Co. as the automaker unwinds electric-vehicle bets and tries to preserve cash after announcing more than €22 billion ($26 billion) in writedowns last week.】

item.title: MGX据悉即将投资Anthropic的200亿美元融资
item.description: 知情人士透露，阿布扎比的MGX即将达成协议，加入Anthropic PBC的最新融资轮，这进一步彰显了其对这家最杰出的人工智能初创企业之一的承诺。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s MGX is nearing a deal to join Anthropic PBC’s latest funding round, people familiar with the matter said, adding to its commitment to one of the most prominent artificial intelligence startups.】

item.title: 黑石集团的蔡旻燮认为私人财富将推动下一阶段增长
item.description: 黑石集团首席财务官蔡明哲表示，该公司正准备推出一系列财富与退休策略产品，同时将现有产品纳入目标日期基金。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is preparing to debut a slew of products for its wealth and retirement strategies as it readies its existing offerings for inclusion in target-date funds, Chief Financial Officer Michael Chae said.】

item.title: 马斯克的星链卫星遭伊朗、俄罗斯在联合国太空会议上抨击
item.description: 伊朗和俄罗斯外交官在联合国会议上表示，埃隆·马斯克的星链卫星星座违反国际法，同时模糊了商业与军事技术的界限。【原文：Elon Musk’s Starlink satellite constellation violates international law while blurring the line between commercial and military technologies, Iranian and Russian diplomats said at a United Nations meeting.】

item.title: 美联储洛根称通胀降温不足以支持进一步降息
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里·洛根表示，她希望通胀能继续回落，但要支持进一步降息，需要劳动力市场出现"实质性"疲软。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan said she’s hopeful inflation will continue to come down, though it would take “material” weakness in the labor market for her to support more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: FAT Brands债权人推迟罢免CEO计划，因其出售股票
item.description: 破产餐饮运营商FAT Brands公司首席执行官得以保住职位——至少目前如此。【原文：The chief executive of bankrupt restaurant operator FAT Brands Inc. can keep his job — for now.】

item.title: 据称橡果保险公司股东正考虑对这家市值10亿英镑的英国出租车保险公司采取多种方案
item.description: 知情人士透露，英国专业汽车和家庭保险公司橡果集团（Acorn Group）的股东正在探索战略选择，包括出售公司控股权。【原文：The owners of British specialist motor and home insurer Acorn Group are exploring strategic options including selling a controlling stake in the company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西债券大崩盘重燃企业困境担忧
item.description: 仅两家企业。但其不断加剧的财务压力已引发债券持有者争相抛售，并引发担忧：在巴西二十年来最高利率的冲击下，更多企业恐将濒临崩溃边缘。【原文：It’s just two companies. But their escalating financial strains have sent bondholders racing to the exits and sown fear that more Brazilian businesses will be driven to the brink by the nation’s highest interest rates in two decades.】

item.title: 萨姆·班克曼-弗里德就FTX欺诈指控申请重审
item.description: 因加密货币交易所崩盘而被判欺诈罪、目前正在服刑25年的FTX联合创始人萨姆·班克曼-弗里德，近日提出了一项希望渺茫的重审请求。他辩称新证人的证词能够推翻检方的指控。【原文：FTX co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried, who is currently serving a 25-year sentence for fraud stemming from the collapse of the cryptocurrency exchange, filed a long-shot request for a new trial, arguing that new witness testimony could refute the prosecution’s case.】

item.title: 科勒与Ares达成13亿美元信贷二级市场交易
item.description: 二级市场投资机构Coller Capital达成一项协议，将延长Ares Management Corp.私募信贷投资组合的存续期，该交易共筹集逾13亿美元资金。【原文：Secondaries firm Coller Capital closed a deal to extend the life of an Ares Management Corp. private credit portfolio, amassing more than $1.3 billion in total commitments.】

item.title: 财富管理类股暴跌，新型人工智能工具引发行业颠覆担忧
item.description: 周二，税务规划与财富管理类股票大幅下挫。此前金融软件供应商Altruist公司推出一款人工智能税务策略生成工具，引发市场担忧传统从业者可能面临风险。【原文：Tax planning and wealth management stocks sank Tuesday after financial software provider Altruist Corp. launched an artificial intelligence tool for creating tax strategies, sparking concerns that traditional players could be at risk.】

item.title: Instagram和YouTube在里程碑式审判中被称为"成瘾机器"
item.description: 一名自称沉迷社交媒体逾十年的20岁女性，周一在陪审团面前短暂露面。该陪审团将裁定Instagram和YouTube是否为牟利而利用了她。【原文：A 20-year-old woman who claims she’s been addicted to social media for more than a decade made a brief appearance Monday before the jury that will decide whether Instagram and YouTube exploited her for profit.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克称利率或将维持不变"相当长一段时间"
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝·哈马克表示，在官员们评估最新经济数据期间，利率可能维持较长时间不变。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said interest rates could be on an extended hold while officials evaluate incoming economic data.】

item.title: Ares首席执行官称对人工智能和私募信贷的担忧"奇怪"且"令人沮丧"
item.description: 阿瑞斯管理公司首席执行官迈克尔·阿鲁盖蒂淡化了私募信贷市场存在问题以及对人工智能颠覆的担忧——这两个因素近期重创了另类资产管理公司的股价。【原文：Ares Management Corp. Chief Executive Officer Michael Arougheti downplayed the idea of trouble in the private credit market and fears of AI disruption, two factors that hammered shares of alternative asset managers recently.】

item.title: Valterra称铂金短缺将持续，因电动汽车普及放缓
item.description: 据大型矿业公司Valterra Platinum Ltd首席执行官称，电动汽车的普及速度低于预期，这将使铂族金属在未来几年持续处于供应短缺状态。【原文：A slower-than-expected rollout of electric vehicles will help keep platinum-group metals in supply shortfalls over the coming years, according to the chief executive officer of major miner Valterra Platinum Ltd.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉向以色列运送首批原油，马杜罗下台后石油出口重启
item.description: 委内瑞拉时隔多年首次向以色列运送原油，随着该国总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗被捕，这个拉丁美洲国家的出口正逐步开放。【原文：Venezuela is sending its first crude oil cargo to Israel in years as the Latin American country’s exports open up following the capture of its president Nicolas Maduro.】

item.title: 兽医公司IVC Evidensia取消55亿美元杠杆贷款交易
item.description: 欧洲最大的兽医服务提供商IVC Evidensia有限公司已搁置一项约55亿美元债务展期计划，这使得今年搁浅的杠杆贷款交易数量进一步增加。【原文：Europe’s largest veterinary services provider, IVC Evidensia Ltd., has shelved a plan to extend about $5.5 billion of debt, adding to a number of stalled leveraged loan deals this year.】

item.title: 巴德·巴尼超级碗造型引发Zara T恤3.5万美元天价挂牌
item.description: Zara T恤——类似流行歌手Bad Bunny在超级碗上穿的那款——在转售平台上现身，标价高达数千欧元。就在数小时前，这些服装才刚分发给全球最大时尚零售商的员工。【原文：Zara T-shirts like the one worn by pop star Bad Bunny during the Super Bowl have surfaced on resale platforms with asking prices in the thousands of euros, hours after the garments were distributed to staff at the world’s largest fashion retailer.】

item.title: PayPal面临十字路口，再度聘请新CEO力图扭转局面
item.description: PayPal控股公司作为数字支付领域的先行者，如今却陷入了难以自拔的困境。【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc., an early mover in the world of digital payments, now finds itself in a rut it can’t seem to get out of.】

item.title: 债权人准备就委内瑞拉600亿美元债务展开谈判，此前马杜罗被捕
item.description: 据知情人士透露，持有委内瑞拉债券的一批国际投资者已选定霍利汉·洛基担任其财务顾问，这是他们为大规模债务重组做准备的关键一步。【原文：A group of international investors holding Venezuelan bonds chose Houlihan Lokey as its financial adviser, according to people familiar with the matter, a key step as they gear up for a massive debt restructuring.】
